messages.message:
Hi all, I started seeing:

```Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/gthread.py", line 281, in handle
    keepalive = self.handle_request(req, conn)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/gthread.py", line 333, in handle_request
    respiter = self.wsgi(environ, resp.start_response)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2213, in __call__
    return self.wsgi_app(environ, start_response)
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/utils/web/flask_util.py", line 324, in __call__
    return self.app(environ, start_response)
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/utils/web/flask_util.py", line 249, in __call__
    return self.app(environ, start_response)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2193, in wsgi_app
    response = self.handle_exception(e)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2189, in wsgi_app
    ctx.push()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/flask/ctx.py", line 377, in push
    self.session = session_interface.open_session(self.app, self.request)
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/server/session_interface.py", line 65, in open_session
    signed_sid = request.cookies.get(app.session_cookie_name)
AttributeError: 'Flask' object has no attribute 'session_cookie_name'```
I think this is happening b/c we upgraded Flask, and that attribute was removed from Flask.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/74094905/deprecationwarning-session-cookie-name-is-deprecated-and-will-be-removed-in-f

Going to put up a fix
@mfichman did you see this error while running the AIHub platform?
Yes -- saw it when starting my crafting sandbox off `master` this morning!

Reverting this PR until we have a proper fix in place. https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69810
cc: @Balaram
